item.description:
I suggest getting there around 1:30 pm so you have time to get your ticket and meet the group at 1:45 pm at the entrance of Gulliver's Travels Theatre. We want to make sure we can get seats together.

Purchase your ticket for the movie of your choice, go through the movie line, and meet at the entrance of the appropriate number theatre where Gulliver's Travels is being shown.

2:10 pm Gulliver's Travels (2010)
This fantasy-filled comedic production opens Christmas Day and is sure to be a fun movie to see as a group.

After the movie we'll head on over to the popular Bauhinia Restaurant (around 4:30 pm) off Route 9/140 in Shrewsbury.

Please sign up for the movie and dinner separately.
To RSVP for Dinner click here...

It's going to be a fun day. Hope to see you there!

Alternate Movie Options
The Tourist - 2:05
Little Fockers - 2:00
Black Swan - 2:15

Post in the comments section below if you plan on seeing one of the alternate movies.
item.name: Matinee Movie on Christmas Day
